messages.subject: Sword Exhibition
messages.msgSnippet: Ladies and Gentlemen For your information, we have reproduced the introductory leaflet of the British Museum s Cutting Edge - Japanese swords at the BM
messages.messageBody:
Ladies and Gentlemen
For your information, we have reproduced the introductory leaflet of the British Museum's "Cutting Edge - Japanese swords at the BM" exhibition on our website which is www.to-ken.com under Members Area. I would urge those interested in the subject to visit.
Regards
Clive Sinclaire

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
